data.message: Some parts of the world without internet. Don't want, know, or need it for a reason

replies.message: Actually it has proved to be only a benefit to almost every under developed nation that has received it. Without the internet Libya's liberation from their dictatorship could never have been possible. Don't speak for these people. most of them want a voice in the global community. most of them want access to an unfathomable knowledge base.
Internet is already giving a signal to the world that freedom can not be stopped era .... any country that prohibits this will hit the stone itself on a next day ....
i meant for those tribes of the amazons etc. that have been living peacefully without interruption for many years
